pages.title: Catnip
pages.text: Feed this to your cat to make it go briefly crazy. You also need this to make some other items.

pages.title: Catnip Seeds
pages.text: These are what you need to plant catnip in your farm.

pages.title: Wild Catnip
pages.text: You can find patches of catnip in the wild. When you break it, you'll get seeds and maybe some other stuff.
